original: 未經任何戰鬥訓練，手上只有鋤頭、草叉等農具，擅長隱蔽身形、能屯田造糧，是被欺壓的最底層，但若被逼急了，還是會進行反擊。
text: Without any combat training, he only has farm tools such as hoes and pitchforks in his hands. He is good at concealing his figure and can farm the fields to make food. He is the bottom of the oppressed, but if he is pressed, he will still fight back.
